DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of healthy volunteers to compare how quickly different ibuprofen products relieve dental pain.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing the Efficacy of Two Ibuprofen Formulations
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria : Outpatients with postoperative pain following surgical extraction of third molars, examined by the attending dentist or physician and medically cleared to participate in the study, in general good health and have no contraindications to the study or rescue medication. Exclusions criteria: any serious medical condition, acute localized dental infection at the time of surgery , females who are pregnant, lactating, of childbearing potential, or postmenopausal for less than 2 years and not using a medically approved method of contraception.
